attributes.action: Please urge Fife Council to put back our grit bins, before Winter.
attributes.additional_details: The lack of grit bins is going to cause accidents and pose a dangers to pedestrians as well as causing issues for those who work to get out and about. It’s all very well the council keeping main roads clear, people have to be able to get out of their estates to be able to use these roads.
attributes.background: Fife Council have decided to take away all grit bins from residential areas. This has been explained by stating they will have grit lorries put in these areas, this is not correct as these are residential streets that have never seen a gritter when the snow is lying on the ground.

rejection.details:
It’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.fifedirect.org.uk/news/index.cfm?fuseaction=cllr.home
